info.name: WebDAV user backend
info.description:
Authenticate users by a WebDAV call. You can use any WebDAV server, ownCloud server or other web server to authenticate. It should return a HTTP 2xx status code for correct credentials and a 4xx or 5xx for invalid ones.
Attention: This app is not the WebDAV interface of ownCloud, if you don't understand what it does then do not enable it.
info.author: Frank Karlitschek
